item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1584; 09:02PM; 2687 N Pasadena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SxnbRb; Lincoln Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 30 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters made an interior attack against the fire on the 1st floor. Due to the compromised floor (previous burn), it was not safe to move up to the 2nd floor. Firefighters positioned both on the stairwell and from the exterior to achieve final extinguishment of all fire on the 2nd floor. Crews also defended the exposed, adjacent, building from damage. No further details.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 CM20 CM22 E12 E2 E201 E202 E212 E47 RA2 T1 T12 T2; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1584; 08:32PM; 2687 N Pasadena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SxnbRb; Lincoln Heights; Two story (vacant) single family dwelling with fire showing from the 1st and 2nd floors. There is at least one additional structure exposed. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E12 E2 E201 E202 E212 E47 RA2 T1 T12 T2; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Train vs Ped - FATALITY; INC#1519; 07:46PM; 2192 S Santa Fe Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3e33LVv; Downtown; Train (Union Pacific) fatally struck pedestrian. Age/gender are unknown. There are no other reported injuries. LAPD Inc# 3900 Newton Division.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E14 E17 E209 E210 EM1 HR3 RA14 RA17 T10; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1620; 12:19AM; 421 Carroll Canal; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RpM4ND; Venice; Structure assessment update: A total of five homes were damaged - The 3 story home under renovation is a total loss as is one of the exposed homes. Three additional homes sustained damage to the eves from the ember cast. The number of displaced occupants is unknown at this time. No injuries reported. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation per protocol for this scale of an incident. No further details.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC10 BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM40 CM42 CM52 E205 E227 E263 E266 E269 E27 E29 E292 E295 E43 E462 E59 E61 E62 E63 EA1 EM9 HR3 PH1 RA59 RA63 RA69 T27 T5 T63 T66 T69 T92 T95 UR27; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN (Updated address) Structure Fire; INC#1620; 12:06AM; 421 Carroll Canal; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RpM4ND; Venice; KNOCKDOWN: Over 100 firefighters extinguished the Major Emergency structure fire in one hour and 20 minutes with no injuries reported. The 3 story single family dwelling was new construction. The blaze extended into the two adjacent residences - the extent of that damage is unknown at this time. The cause and $ loss TBD. Firefighters will be on scene through the night conducting overhaul operations which will impact traffic on the narrow street. ; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC10 BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM40 CM42 CM52 E205 E227 E263 E266 E269 E27 E29 E292 E295 E43 E462 E59 E61 E62 E63 EM9 HR3 PH1 RA59 RA63 RA69 T27 T5 T63 T66 T69 T92 T95 UR27; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1620; 11:51PM; 426 S Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SOQHBL; Venice; Three story, single family dwelling fully involved in fire with exposures on all sides. This incident is now at the Major Emergency status. No injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 10:44PM.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC10 BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM40 CM42 CM52 E205 E227 E263 E266 E269 E27 E29 E292 E295 E43 E462 E59 E61 E62 E63 EM9 HR3 PH1 RA59 RA63 RA69 T27 T5 T63 T66 T69 T92 T95 UR27; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0550; 10:35AM; 18569 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M1oHZn; Tarzana; KNOCKDOWN: 45 firefighters extinguished the fire in 30 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was primarily in the common (about 2' high) attic and moved horizontally down the B side (West) towards the C side (North) of the building. The truck companies on the roof created holes in the roof and used handlines to extinguish the bulk of the fire while interior fire attack address fire in the walls in (at least) one unit. Firefighters will remain on scene for salvage and overhaul operations. Cause of the fire and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E273 E288 E305 E73 E83 E84 EM17 RA73 T105 T73 T88; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0550; 09:55AM; 18569 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M1oHZn; Tarzana; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire in one unit and traveling up the walls. Additional resources requested (reflected in this alert). Any additional units impacted by the smoke are being evacuated.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E100 E273 E288 E73 E83 RA73 T73 T88 E84 CM42 LF105 EM17 BC10 ; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1152; 07:43PM; 1198 W Anaheim St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Cnu2r0; Wilmington; KNOCKDOWN: Over 70 firefighters extinguished the fire in two hours and 37 minutes with no injuries reported. The mop up will continue (helicopters are still making water drops to assist) well into the evening. No further details.; FS 85; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 BC13 BC6 CM20 CM22 E101 E112 E285 E290 E36 E38 E40 E48 E49 E57 E79 E85 E90 EM13 H1 H2 H4 HA1 HA2 HA4 HT3 RA85 T85 T90; CH7; 16; Margaret Stewart

Update Grass Fire; INC#1152; 06:01PM; 1198 W Anaheim St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Cnu2r0; Wilmington; The fire is estimated at 5 acres with light wind conditions. The smoke plume will be visible for an extended because of the type of fuel burning (marsh reeds) and the difficulty in reaching the fires edge. Additional engines due to the access challenge and the need for water shuttles to provide the water supply. There are no structures threatened. Firefighters will be working this fire into the evening. There are no injuries reported. Two engines from @LBFD are on scene assisting. No further details.; FS 85; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E101 E112 E36 E38 E40 E48 E49 E57 E79 E85 RA85; CH7; 16; Margaret Stewart
